input.sentences: the firemen responded to the emergency call .
everyone worked together to safely remove the passenger .
the vehicle was in a bad state after the collision .
the fireman looked over the contents of the car .
one last inspection was made before the vehicle was removed .
output.sentences: It was a typical day for Station 24 but that didn't make it easy.
When they arrived on scene they found a car totalled against a delivery truck.
Luckily, it didn't appear as if anyone was decimated in the crash.
The firemen made sure there was no gas leak or any other danger to pedestrians, before awaiting further orders.
At least everyone got out alive this time.
